name: Sweet Potato Fries Dipping Sauce
description: This sweet potato fries dipping sauce is super creamy and packed with delicious Cajun flavors! It's kind of like spicy mayonnaise, just so much better! And it's super easy to make and completely vegan.
recipeIngredient: 1-2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning ((depending on how spicy your seasoning is))
sriracha sauce, to taste (adjust the amount of spiciness to your personal liking )

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl. I used store-bought vegan mayonnaise but you could also easily make your own with soy milk and oil in a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl. I used store-bought vegan mayonnaise but you could also easily make your own with soy milk and oil in a blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir until well combined. Adjust the amount of sriracha sauce to your personal liking. Start with just a bit of sriracha sauce and then add more if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir until well combined. Adjust the amount of sriracha sauce to your personal liking. Start with just a bit of sriracha sauce and then add more if needed.
